rules.name: Portal Mechanics
rules.description: Portals to the Void Realm require specific artifacts to open and maintain
examples: The Keystone can open portals when activated
exceptions: Natural rifts can occur in areas of dimensional weakness

rules.name: Artifact Activation
rules.description: Artifacts respond to the emotional state of the user
examples: The Keystone activates when the holder shows trust

mechanics.name: Void Realm Time Dilation
mechanics.description: Time passes differently in the Void Realm compared to the real world

constraints.name: Solo Limitations
constraints.description: Characters working alone are less effective than those working together
